title: Phruronellus
text:
Phruronellus is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="North%20America">North America</a>n <a href="Araneomorphae">araneomorph</a> spiders first described by <a href="Ralph%20Vary%20Chamberlin">R. V. Chamberlin</a> in 1921. Originally placed with the <a href="Liocranidae">Liocranidae</a>, it was moved to the <a href="Corinnidae">Corinnidae</a> in 2002, and to the <a href="Phrurolithidae">Phrurolithidae</a> in 2014.
Species.
 it contains five species, all found in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>:
